data.title: Great breakfast!
data.text: We did not have to wait long to get in and it was a very good breakfast!  The waitress was great, very fast and friendly!

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're happy to hear you didn't have to wait long and that you experienced fast and friendly service with us. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Consistently good breakfast
data.text: I went by for a late breakfast while I was in town.  This The Egg and I had good reviews, and the reviews are accurate.  The service was good and friendly, and the food was prepared well and tasted good.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're happy to hear that you experienced friendly service and that you enjoyed your meal as well. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: They were so accommodating for our group. The food and service were exemplary! Will go back again! I had a waffle with berries that was great! Others had a harvest hash and a kale smoothie that were great!

data.title: Surprisingly Good
data.text: Cheyenne Wyoming is not known for its abundance of restaurants. We were there on a Sunday and The Egg and I was one of the few restaurants that were open.  It is like a big diner so we did not know what to expect.  My wife ordered a salad while I ordered a chicken salad sandwich. They were both fresh, well prepared and very good. Both exhibited some culinary creativity. A very good lunch in the most unlikely of locations. Would go there again.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for giving us a try! We're happy to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your meals with us and had a great experience. We can't wait to see you both again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great lunch
data.text: I met a friend for lunch and we're both very pleased with their food and the service. I ordered half a Greek salad and have a turkey Reuben. The salad was so delicious it didn't even need dressing. Brianna was our server and she was great.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Luv! We're glad to hear that you and your friend enjoyed your lunch with us and experienced great service as well. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Worth the wait
data.text: Kitchen didn't seem to have their act together but the wait staff  and food was excellent! They got our large group seated quickly and coffee to us right away.  Food took a bit longer but was satisfying.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your meal and experienced excellent service but are sorry that food took longer to arrive. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Chain
data.text:
Passed on local breakfast places to try this well rated chain...wished we hadn't now.  Our meals were "good".  Service was "good".  Nothing was great.  The grits served were not even "good".  They were "bad".  Came out as grit soup.  Way more water than grits.  When brought to the attention of the waitress she shrugged and said she noticed when picking it up out of the kitchen, but that "they" were changing lots of recipes right now.  I doubt there will be a big demand for grit soup.

Anyway, this was my first and last visit to any Egg and I location.  I'll take my chances at the local places or stop at the ultimate chain, McD's.

Sorry for the poor review, but it was earned.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your recent visit and for this feedback. We are very sorry that you did not enjoy your grits and were not impressed with our service during your visit. We take our service and food very seriously and it is upsetting to know this is how your visit went. Thank you for taking the time to share your concerns - we will address them immediately. We do hope you give us another try in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: They lighter fare menu
data.text: This restaurant has middle eastern favors, lots of vegetables, spices and fresh fruit.  Very good,  prices reasonable, and staff is friendly.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review, Paula! We're happy to hear you love our food and that the staff is always friendly. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food, awesome juice
data.text: Gluten free menu, good service ( little slow so no rush)  and good feel. I had a positive experience.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much, Sul! We're happy to hear you experienced great service and the gluten free options we have to offer. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Classic Breakfast cafe
data.text: If you're a breakfast fan then this is your place. They have all of the usual favorites and do them well. I've been several times and I've always left happy. The service is good and the food is reliable. It's clean and bright - a nice place to start the day.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review! We're happy to hear you enjoy our food and that you always have a great experience with us. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great brunch!
data.text: Our favorite time to come here is on Sunday morning after mass. There is usually a bit of a line, but we feel it is well worht the wait. The food is always delicious.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're glad to hear that the food is always delicious but we are sorry about the long wait on the weekends. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Breakfast before heading home.
data.text:
After attending a family wedding in Cheyenne my wife and I decided to get breakfast before we traveled back home. 
We were seated quickly after we arrived .  The waitress was at our table asking if we wanted coffee after we got seated.  She returned quickly and provided information on the special menu.  We placed our order and the meal arrived quickly and she checked on how things were going. 
The meal was just why we needed before hitting the road for the long drive home.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Public Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for giving us a try, Darrell! We're happy to hear that you were sat quickly and experienced great service during your visit. We are glad you enjoyed your food and that we could give you just what you needed before your long drive home. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A great place to eat and terrific service
data.text: My husband ordered a omelet and I had the scrambled egg croissant.  We both enjoyed the meal and will eat there again when in the area!

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much! We're glad you enjoyed your Scrambled Egg Croissant while your husband loved his Omelet. We can't wait to see you both again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Good
data.text: Breakfast was nice, and the staff was great, very friendly. We would defiantly eat here again. Great for kids and families.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review, Rebekah! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your breakfast with us and that the staff was awesome during your visit. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Family Trip
data.text: The Egg and I was a great restaurant!  We visited due to recommendations on Trip Advisor and were very happy with our experience.  They quickly accommodated our large party of 9, and promptly took our orders and delivered the food.  The staff was very friendly!  The pancakes were delicious.  Highly recommend!

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review, Mandy! We're happy to hear you loved your pancakes and that the service was excellent in serving your large party. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Huevos Rancheros
data.text: First time in Cheyenne. Super friendly staff. Super fast service. I have the Huevos rancheros top those with the green pork sauce and salsa (waitresses recommendation). Great stuff. Definitely on my places to eat it next time I am in Cheyenne

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for giving us a try! We're glad that you enjoyed the Huevos Rancheros and that the staff was super friendly during your visit. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent food & service
data.text: We've never had a bad meal here.  Service staff is great and the breakfasts are even better.  Coffee is always good and hot.  Breakfasts are wonderful and a wide variety is available.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: patriciarK4481YQ we're thrilled that you've never had a bad meal here! We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hearty Breakfast
data.text: While visiting a friend in Cheyenne we had breakfast here. He always spoke highly of his regular breakfast spot. Lived up to his praise. Food was excellent with good variety.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for giving us a try! We're glad you enjoyed your meal with us and liked the wide variety we offer on our menu. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Never got seated...
data.text: Waited by front entire time for 30min..never called my name...they went outside to get other groups..zero organization

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Lance we are sincerely sorry for the disappointing service that you experienced at our restaurant, and we do appreciate you notifying us of these issues. You should always be able to expect quick, attentive service. We value your patronage and hope you'll consider giving us another try soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very good food
data.text: We were there for a business lunch and the food was very fresh and very tasty. The price was good and I would certainly go back.

owner_response.author: Egg P, Guest Relations Manager at The Egg & I, responded to this review
owner_response.text: JPG9393 thank you for your kind words. We're delighted to hear how much you enjoy The Egg & I Restaurants. We can't wait to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
